name: David And Goliath
description:
This game was made for Historically Accurate Game Jam 4. The theme of the jam was Mythology. We have chosen David vs Goliath, where a simple shepherd with only a sling was able to defeat an armored giant (Goliath).

Instructions:

Move David to the battle area (on the right) using WASD keys. When a "Quick Reaction" event is triggered, just select quickly the required keyboard button. There is a first demo of that when going close to the pillar at the entrance of the battle area. The quick reaction event is to dodge Goliath attacks and after a few attack he becomes tired and then David will attack automatically.

Press Alt-F4 to close the game.

Game developed using Unreal Engine 4.
